page.title: 03GOYTRE CARNIVAL REVIEW 1985
page.content: It was a sunny afternoon when the carnival floats paraded around our village.We liked the {Army }float the best.The winner was the float depicting the {Quality Street} characters,a man was giving away sweets and throwing them in all directions. Everyone found something to amuse them when the stalls opened.We walked over to the {football game,}three shots for 20p.,and the person with the highest score won a watch.Later the { {Fancy Dress Competion}began and this was very amusing. The children entered {Art}and{ {Handwriting}competions and also ran in {races}.The fastest boy was Matthew Minor and the best girl was Karen Jones.We all really enjoyed the { {Carnival}this year. By Lisa James and Mark Baxter.
